question.text:
To: Scott Douglas [sdouglas@evergladeprints.com]
From: Edward Kovac [edward.k@collinsconsulting,com]
Subject: Brochure alterations
Date: 8 May
Dear Mr. Douglas,
Please find attached a copy of the brochure you designed with our comments. Our team has reviewed the draft, and we are ---1--- with the quality of the pamphlet thus far. Despite this, we do require a few changes.
In particular, there were minor layout and color errors and some important information was ---2--- as well. We left notes in the brochure regarding where the omitted details should go. ---3---. Please send us a revised draft when it is ready. We will, of course, be happy to ---4--- the extra cost.
Best wishes,
Edward
Our team has reviewed the draft, and we are ---1--- with the quality of the pamphlet thus far.

answer.explanation: be satisfied with sth

question.text: In particular, there were minor layout and color errors and some important information was ---2--- as well.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words

question.text: We left notes in the brochure regarding where the omitted details should go. ---3---.
choices: (A) We are not sure why these details
(B) We need each correction to be reflected precisely.
(C) We would like you to change the entire layout.
(D) We ask that you send the invoice for the design we chose.

answer.text: (B) We need each correction to be reflected precisely.
answer.explanation: The following sentence mentions "a revised draft" => B is correct

question.text: We will, of course, be happy to ---4--- the extra cost.

answer.explanation: be adjective + to infinitive

question.text:
June 21
Magnum Insurance
337 Deerborne Avenue
Banff, Alberta, T2N 4S5
Canada
Dear Mr. Clayburn,
This letter is to inform you that we have received your insurance claim for hail damage to your home, and we are ---1--- processing it. As you know, the powerful storm last week affected the entire city. As a result, an overwhelming number of homeowners ---2--- assistance. Nevertheless, we are working as speedily as we can to handle these applications.
An adjuster can inspect your property in a few days. ---3---. You can speed up the process by presenting documentary evidence ahead of time. Still, it may take some weeks to complete all the necessary forms and prepare a compensation ---4---. We hope you understand. The funds you'll need to carry out the necessary repairs will be transmitted to you as quickly as possible.
Thank you for your cooperation.
Judith Underwood
Claims coordinator
This letter is to inform you that we have received your insurance claim for hail damage to your home, and we are ---1--- processing it.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of adverbs

question.text: As a result, an overwhelming number of homeowners ---2--- assistance.

answer.explanation: The subject is "homeowners" => C is correct

question.text: An adjuster can inspect your property in a few days. ---3---.
choices: (A) You will need to submit your insurance claim as soon as possible.
(B) He has provided you with the assistance you require.
(C) Making this investment will raise your homeâ€™s market value.
(D) If possible, start photographing the damaged areas of your home.

answer.text: (D) If possible, start photographing the damaged areas of your home.
answer.explanation: The notice is about the areas damaged by a storm => they are going to inspect the property

question.text: Still, it may take some weeks to complete all the necessary forms and prepare a compensation ---4---.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words

question.text:
To: All staff
From: Susan Ward
Subject: Employee handbook
Date: April 15
Thank you to everyone who participated in the discussions with company management. Your comments about some employees being unaware of the procedures for day-to-day operations have been heard. We are now working to ---1--- the situation.
For starters, we will be publishing the company's standard operating procedures as soon as possible. A printed guide will give management and staff an official reference on the performance of daily tasks. ---2---. Flopefully, it will help move us closer to our goal of having firmly ---3--- policies.
If any revisions are required, these will be incorporated into a later version of the manual. The final version will also be ---4--- through the company's internal network. If you have any questions, please direct them to your departmental supervisors.
We are now working to ---1--- the situation.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of verbs.

question.text: A printed guide will give management and staff an official reference on the performance of daily tasks. ---2---.
choices: (A) A provisional copy of this handbook will be distributed at the next meeting.
(B) Yourcomments on the revised manual  were very much appreciated.
(C) A copy of the article may be found in last month's company newsletter.
(D) We are glad that everyone is now up-to-date on our meeting schedule.

answer.text: (A) A provisional copy of this handbook will be distributed at the next meeting.
answer.explanation: The previous sentence mentions a printed guide

question.text: Hopefully, it will help move us closer to our goal of having firmly ---3--- policies.

answer.explanation: We need an adjective to modify the noun "policies"

question.text: The final version will also be ---4--- through the company's internal network.

answer.explanation: be + adjective

question.text:
refer to the following e -mail.

You are receiving this e-mail ---1--- you have contacted Brell Home in the past about our houseware products or have visited our Web site. (B) The issue has not yet been resolved.

question.text:
refer to the following notice.

Please note that the south lobby of the building will be closed from 7: 00 P.M. this evening to 7: 00 A.M tomorrow morning. Routine ---1--- will be performed on the heating and cooling systems. ---2--- the central air conditioning will be turned off between these hours. We have scheduled any necessary ---3--- to take place outside of regular business hours. ---4--- If you need access to the building during these hours, please use the north lobby or the basement-level entrances. They will be unlocked and extra lighting will be provided in these two areas.

Thank you,
Building Management
Routine ---1--- will be performed on the heating and cooling systems.

answer.explanation: The blank is in the position of subject => need a noun

question.text: ---2--- the central air conditioning will be turned off between these hours.

answer.explanation: Routine maintenance will be performed, leading to the central air conditioning will be turned off

question.text: We have scheduled any necessary ---3--- to take place outside of regular business hours.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words

question.text: ---4--- If you need access to the building during these hours, please use the north lobby or the basement-level entrances.
choices: (A) Extra office chairs will be available.
(B) Our goal is to minimize your discomfort while you are in the office.
(C) The thermostat setting needed to be reset.
(D) The employee entrance code is changing again next month.

answer.text: (B) Our goal is to minimize your discomfort while you are in the office.
answer.explanation: The repairs take place during regular business hours => B is correct

question.text:
refer to the following e-mail.

To: Kristina Tursi
From: Steven Bracchio
Date: August 24
Subject: Thank you

Dear Ms. Tursi,
Thank you for your time today. I ---1--- enjoyed meeting and interviewing with your team. It is clear to me that Fratelli Tursi is a dynamic company ---2--- for great success. ---3--- . As we discussed, I am comfortable conducting business in the Italian language, and beyond that, I believe my marketing skills would strongly support Fratelli Tursi's efforts to grow internationally.
I understand that the partners will be considering whom to call in to the office for ---4--- interviews.
Please let me know if you require additional information about me. I very much look forward to hearing from you.

Steven Bracchio
I ---1--- enjoyed meeting and interviewing with your team.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of adverbs

question.text: It is clear to me that Fratelli Tursi is a dynamic company ---2--- for great success.

answer.explanation: reduced relative clause in passive form => use past participle

question.text: ---3--- . As we discussed, I am comfortable conducting business in the Italian language, and beyond that, I believe my marketing skills would strongly support Fratelli Tursi's efforts to grow internationally.
choices: (A) My salary has risen with my increased responsibilities.
(B) The office space is well designed.
(C) I think my skills are a good match for the needs of your sales team.
(D) Please use my personal e-mail address to reach me.

answer.text: (C) I think my skills are a good match for the needs of your sales team.
answer.explanation: C is the most suitable answer

question.text: I understand that the partners will be considering whom to call in to the office for ---4--- interviews.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words

question.text:
refer to the following letter.

Do you change your opening and closing times depending on the season? According to market research, a quarter of all small businesses periodically ---1--- their operating hours. Sincerely,
Richard N. Batterman
Account Representative Muros Solutions

According to market research, a quarter of all small businesses periodically ---1--- their operating hours.

question.text: Inaccurate information can lead to customer frustration, which can drive them to do business with your competitors. ---2---.

(D) Once lost, they can be hard to bring back.

question.text: One of our services is designed to help you monitor ---3--- your operating hours are being shown on the Web.

answer.explanation: Based on the meaning of words

question.text: We would be happy to work with you ---4--- your business's opportunities.

question.text:
refer to the following information.

This year, several opportunities for professional networking will be added. Attendees will have the chance to market ---2---. to firms in several different industries. question.text:
refer to the following advertisement.

question.text:
refer to the following newspaper article.
